title: Twist of Fate
description: ❤️❤️❤️ “Just a few yards ahead of her, the pines snapped in half like twigs. She braced herself. “Oh my God, oh my God!” was all she could utter when she saw the twister…” – Excerpt from Twist of FateIt took a sudden heart attack and a long-coming diagnosis of type 2 diabetes for Dr. Cody Walker to admit he had to turn his life around and practice what he had preached all these years as a physician.With a second chance at life, he moves from Atlanta to the small town of Magnolia Hill to take over old Doc Porter’s practice. But saving his patients—and himself—from the grim outlook of preventable chronic diseases is easier said than done when Jenna’s cupcake bakery across the street from his practice is testing his—and his patients’—willpower to resist her sweet temptations.Jenna Wilson’s dream of owning a successful cupcake bakery had finally come true. However, that dream shatters when the grumpy new doctor in town accuses her of poisoning his diabetic patients with her sugary treats and threatens to shut down her shop.But when a natural disaster strikes close to home, they are forced to challenge their beliefs. Is there any hope Cody and Jenna can work out their differences and maybe even find love in this grumpy/sunshine enemies to lovers sweet romance?If you enjoy clean, just kisses romances, charming characters, a small-town feel, and the excitement of stormy weather, then you'll love Lexie Nicholas's Southern Storms novels.***All books in this series can be read as standalone stories, but they are much more fun if you read them in order.Get your copy at your favorite ebook retailer or your local library and start reading Twist of Fate today.
author: Lexie Nicholas
